ST27-001.name: Avalo Pizarro ST27-001
ST27-001.effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may rest 1 of your [Fullalead] cards: If your Leader has the {Blackbeard Pirates} type, this Character gains +4000 power during this turn. [On K.O.] Draw 1 card.

ST27-002.name: Catarina Devon ST27-002
ST27-002.effect: [Activate: Main] You may trash this Character: If your Leader has the {Blackbeard Pirates} type, give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters âˆ’1 cost during this turn. [On K.O.] Draw 1 card.

ST27-003.name: Kuzan ST27-003
ST27-003.effect: [Blocker] [On K.O.] Play up to 1 {Blackbeard Pirates} type Character card with a cost of 5 or less from your trash rested.

ST27-004.name: Sanjuan Wolf ST27-004
ST27-004.effect: If your Leader has the {Blackbeard Pirates} type, this Character gains [Blocker] and +1 cost for every 4 cards in your trash. [On Play] Trash 1 card from your hand.

ST27-005.name: Marshall D. Teach ST27-005
ST27-005.effect: [Activate: Main] You may rest this Character: K.O. up to 1 Character with a cost of 3 or less. [On K.O.] Add up to 1 black card from your trash to your hand.
